title: Ep. 147 "Pussy Monster" ft. Brandi Mallory
description:
This week we’re joined by Brandi Mallory, who was on Extreme Weightloss Season 4! We discuss body dysmorphia, body positivity, dating when obese, men vs. women, getting rocks thrown at your window, and dealing with the aftermath of weightless, physically and mentally.

Be sure to get your tickets to the live show!

www.cocktalespod.eventbrite.com

9/14/19 Houston, TX
9/21/19 Dallas, TX
